title: Replace
lyrics:
Turn me up
Hey
Jay Critch hood fave
Talk Money Gang
Jamz turn me up

I'm in a Wraith feeling like I'm outer space (Outer space)

I blow a bag then you know it get replaced (Replace)

Wait, diamonds go apeshit (Apeshit), making you cover your face (Cover your face)

Shorty just take dick, I don't take her on a date

They always frontin' I'm on to something

I just made a play for the green

I need a award or somethin', we all be stuntin'

I'm breaking bread with the team

We got it all from nothing, the hoes is coming

They know the money with me (They know the money with me)

Check out the stones that's light up VV (VV)

I'm on the road like I popped a bean



My shooters don't pass, they jack it from deep

You can't get a pass, stop jacking the team

Spent five on a bag, my jacket cost three

I get me the bag, then I gotta leave (I gotta leave)

I don't care what you say, I don't know you

Diamonds going Super Saiyan like Goku (Like Goku)

Young nigga make a lot of bands off of Pro Tools

Nigga's taking out the flip phone like it's '02

And I gotta keep it real, keep it old school (Keep it real)

Nigga's saying that they will but they won't do

Had to do it for the hills, what I told you (For the hills)

I was in the chicken spot, now it's Nobu

Now we going worldwide but you're local (Local)

Just chill out you nigga's too heavy (Heavy)

Quit cappin' you nigga's ain't ready

Your chatter is giving me headaches

Why my pinky ring look like confetti

Fuck a hoe, I just want me some cake (Want me some cake)

The strap is close, momma told me be safe

I had to go put the racks in the safe



I'm in a Wraith feeling like I'm outer space (Outer space)

I blow a bag then you know it get replaced (Replace)

Wait, diamonds go apeshit (Apeshit), making you cover your face (Cover your face)

Shorty just take dick, I don't take her on a date

They always frontin' I'm on to something

I just made a play for the green

I need a award or somethin', we all be stuntin'

I'm breaking bread with the team

We got it all from nothing, the hoes is coming

They know the money with me (They know the money with me)

Check out the stones that's light up VV (VV)

I'm on the road like I popped a bean



That's a fact, pockets full with the Gs (That's a fact)

Watch your back, block 100 degrees

I don't do shit for free, they paying a fee

I'm flexing hard, gotta watch what I eat

Diamond shine like they brushing they teeth (Brushing they teeth)

Pacing like two-twos new whip with the moon roof

My niggas connected like bluetooth

Niggas broke they better go get a Blues Clues

I be first to that money and you lose (You lose)

I be first to that money and you lose (You lose)

The bankroll all hundreds, it's true blues

If she sucking me right, get her new shoes (Sucking me right)

Tell her hold a toolie cause I gotta lay low

Might put the bitch on a payroll

I have [?]

Now I got the bankroll, might catch a flight to Tobago

Hood fav, I stay talking 'bout a check

Pockets correct

I been balling, keep my foot on they neck

Pussy boy call it a tec

She keep calling but I told her just put it to rest

Shorty I'm on to the next (Hey)

Good brain now she taking a guess

Money long range, I be making it stretch

Excuse the cheese, what's the hold up (Hold up)

Make some plays off of that Motorola (Motorola)

Green on me like I'm Yoda (Yoda)

Since she wanna taste, want a sip of this soda?

New chain heavy, feel like a boulder

The 'Rari sick like the shit got Ebola (Got Ebola)

My necklace is stacking up, it's getting colder

Like Tetris I stack this shit up 'til it's game over (Game over)



I'm in a Wraith feeling like I'm outer space (Outer space)

I blow a bag then you know it get replaced (Replace)

Wait, diamonds go apeshit (Apeshit), making you cover your face (Cover your face)

Shorty just take dick, I don't take her on a date

They always frontin' I'm on to something

I just made a play for the green

I need a award or somethin', we all be stuntin'

I'm breaking bread with the team

We got it all from nothing, the hoes is coming

They know the money with me (They know the money with me)

Check out the stores that's light up VV (VV)

I'm on the road like I popped a bean



Aye, I'm in the wraith

Wait, diamonds go ape shit making you cover your face

Aye, I'm in the wraith feeling like I'm outer space

Wait, diamonds go ape shit, making you cover your face
